text: Lavena Ponte Tresa is a comune (municipality) on Lake Lugano in the Province of Varese in the Italian region of Lombardy. It is about northwest of Milan and about north of Varese, on the border with Switzerland. Lavena Ponte Tresa is next to these municipalities: Brusimpiano, Cadegliano-Viconago, Caslano (Switzerland), Croglio (Switzerland), Marzio, Ponte Tresa (Switzerland). == References == Category:Settlements in Varese
title: Lavena Ponte Tresa
